My Javascript skills are just not where they need to be in order to understand all of the specific changes I need to make to the project in order to get it to work with the new “Breeze Angular Service”, even after goingthrough the following:

http://www.breezejs.com/documentation/breeze-labs/breezeangularqjs

I’ll probably post a question somewhere… PluralSight… StackOverflow… Anyway… you still ROCK… keep up the good work.
